mapper.insert: insert into b_bank_card (application_form_number, bank_card_number, bank_card_holder, bank_name) values (#{applicationFormNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCardHolder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select application_form_number, bank_card_number, bank_card_holder, bank_name from b_bank_card
